step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your arms in front of your chest and making fists. Try to tighten your muscles a bit more as you inhale.
You're opening your fingers and extending your arms well. Focus on a smooth exhale as you relax your muscles and keep your arms at shoulder height.
Continue to open your fingers and extend your arms. Ensure your muscles are relaxed as you exhale.
Your arm movements are good. Keep your wrists relaxed and try to maintain a consistent shoulder height throughout the movement.
Great job completing the repetitions! Remember to focus on the muscle tightening during the inhale and relaxation during the exhale for maximum benefit.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles while bringing your arms in, then exhale and relax while extending them outwards. Keep up the good work!
